How to: How to adjust gas fees on MetaMask?
T1: Here is a quick guide on how to manually adjust gas fees:
P1: This is the standard pop up you will see when MetaMask needs your authorization to approve the transaction you are about to make.
P2: To simplify the process, MetaMask would have already determined the amount of gas needed and show a rough estimate of the gas fee.
P3: You can hit the “Edit” button next to the estimated gas fee for more options.
P4: You will be presented with the option to toggle between three different speeds: low, medium and high. it is recommended to select medium or high to avoid gas errors.
